column1: tatar_union_diplo_desc;The Tatar States are weak and fragmented. For far to long we have underestimated the Russians and the fall of the Kazan Khanate proved this. The realization of this threat and the shifting balance of power has convinced our great Khan to reconsile with his old tatar rivals. All the Khans have agreed to reestablish the Altin Urda under our banner! Moscow will burn!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

tatar_union_mil_desc;The Tatar States were weak and fragmented. For far to long we have underestimated the Russians and the fall of the Kazan Khanate proved this. We need to overthrow our old rivals and reassert our dominance over the Russians once again. Âšerge Han!;;;;;;;;;;;;x
tatar_formation_desc;The Tatar States were weak and fragmented. After decades of struggle and decline we managed to subdue the Tatar Steppes
column2: now it is time to reclaim Batu Khans legacy.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: end_kazan_desc;For centuries the raids originating from Kazan have devasteded. It is time to finally bring an end to the Tatar Joke!;;;;;;;;;;;;x
control_novgorod_desc;The Republic of Novgorod has been a part of our sphere of influence for centuries
column2: but with increasing russian nationalism we should integrate them further into our realm.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: integrate_estonia_desc;Estonia has been a dominion of Sweden since the 16th century
column2: but with the increasing threat of russian unification our control of the Northern Baltics is in danger. We should sacrifice the estonian autonomy to secure the regions stability!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: integrate_livonia_desc;Livonia has been a dominion of Sweden since the 16th century
column2: but with the increasing threat of russian unification our control of the Northern Baltics is in danger. We should sacrifice the livonian autonomy to secure the regions stability!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: integrate_ingermanland_desc;Ingria has been a dominion of Sweden since the 16th century
column2: but with the increasing threat of russian unification our control of the Northern Baltics is in danger. We should sacrifice the ingrian autonomy to secure the regions stability!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: vassalize_nogay_rej_desc;The foolish Khan of Nogay has refused our offer. We need to subjugate him by the sword to save the Tatars from russian expansionism!;;;;;;;;;;;;x
vassalize_nogay_acc_desc;The Khan of Nogay has accepted our offer. The Russians wont stand a chance against a united Steppe!;;;;;;;;;;;;x
centralize_the_khanate_desc;Now that the russian threat has been dealt with our rule is unchallenged. It is time to formally unite the Khanate!;;;;;;;;;;;;x
vassalize_sib_rej_desc;The foolish Khan of Qashliq has refused our offer. We need to subjugate him by the sword to save the Tatars from russian expansionism!;;;;;;;;;;;;x
vassalize_sib_acc_desc;The Khan of Qashliq has accepted our offer. The Russians wont stand a chance against a united Steppe!;;;;;;;;;;;;x
vassalize_akh_acc_desc;The Khan of Astrakhan has accepted our offer. The Russians wont stand a chance against a united Steppe!;;;;;;;;;;;;x
avenge_kazan_desc;The russian conquest of Kazan was extremely brutal. It depopulated the once rich region of the Upper Idel
column2: thousends of Kazanis fleed their home and even more got killed by Skobelevs troops
column3: not to mention the ruthless execution of the Khan and it's entire family. It is our duty
column4: now that the Steppe stands united

column1: subdue_yugra_desc;The fur traders of the yugrian wastes were able to remain independant by opportunistically switching alliances with the Tatars and Russians. Now that we are dominating both Russia and the Steppe we are in a position to assume direcet control over their valueable ressources.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: the cold wastes of Siberia are almost free to grab. The only thing holding us back is the influencial position of the Oirat Khagnate in Tuva and the Baikal. The conquest of the Sayan Tribes will increase our influence in the region.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: annex_altai_uriankhai_desc;Our increased influence in Tuva allows us to further integrate the region
column2: this act however will force the Oirats to act.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: vassalize_buryatia_desc;The Oirat control in Central Siberia has collapsed
column2: we need to fill this vacuum of power.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: the_daurs_title;Take control in the Daur Khanate;;;;;;;;;;;;x
the_daurs_desc;The Oirat control in the North has collapsed
column2: we need to fill this vacuum of power.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: the_manchu_desc;The momentum of the Pacific Push still hasn't slowed down. A lot of Tatar tribes still search for their own
column2: new
column3: suitable plot of land. Many of these tribes now violated the territory of the Jurchen
column4: a tributary of the Great Shun. This needs to be settled so that further conflict can be avoided.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: further_siberian_expansion_desc;The semi-nomadic Sakhalar originally fleed from the mongols in the 13th century. They now live in the rich basins of the Lena
column2: Aldan and Vilyuy Rivers and are fabled as horse breeders. But now they pose the last obstacle in our Push to the Pacific
column3: their subjugating would not only give us access to their skills
column4: but also their rich fur market.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: the_pacific_desc;Our troops have finally reached the long awaited coastline
column2: but our forces meet resistance from the local population. Even though our troops were successfull
column3: the areas of Kamchatka and Chukchia are now almost uninhabitated. Nevertheless
column4: we should formally announce the annexetion of these territory!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: conquest_of_the_north_desc;The land of the Tymyr was thought to be only a part of Siberlar folklore
column2: but with our conquest multiple multiple reports have told us about a group of people far in the north speaking a familiar sounding language. We should use this to justify the conquest of these regions!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_the_northern_caucasus_desc;While the Northwestern Caucasus has been under our control for centuries the Northeast has been part of the Timurid Empire
column2: but the recent collapse of the iranian behemoth left the entire Caucasus in turmoil. Local Khanates
column3: Tribes and Christian Kingdoms is all what is left. This is a perfect opportunity to not only establish a amazing natural border
column4: but also to integrate the turkic tribes living in these regions!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_qasim_desc;The Tatars of Qasim originated from the lands of the Golden Horde
column2: but during their collapse thousends of Tatars fleed. The Hetmans of Ryazan and Kursk offered them refugee. In exchange they were ordered to protect the border regions and during time most of them even converted to Christianity. Now that the Khanate is united once again we should reincorporate our lost brethern!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_the_northern_caucasus_rth_desc;While the Northwestern Caucasus has been under our control for centuries the Northeast has been part of the Timurid Empire
column2: but the recent collapse of the iranian behemoth left the entire Caucasus in turmoil. Local Khanates
column3: Tribes and Christian Kingdoms is all what is left. This is a perfect opportunity to establish a amazing natural border!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_the_northern_caucasus_rus_desc;While the Northwestern Caucasus has been under our control for centuries the Northeast has been part of the Timurid Empire
column2: but the recent collapse of the iranian behemoth left the entire Caucasus in turmoil. Local Khanates
column3: Tribes and Christian Kingdoms is all what is left. This is a perfect opportunity to establish a amazing natural border!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: subdue_yugra_rus_desc;The fur traders of the yugrian wastes were able to remain independant by opportunistically switching alliances with the Tatars and Russians. Now that we are dominating both Russia and the Steppe we are in a position to assume direcet control over their valueable ressources.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
subdue_the_sayan_rus_desc;Now that we extended our control to the banks of the Yenisey
column2: the cold wastes of Siberia are almost free to grab. The only thing holding us back is the influencial position of the Oirat Khagnate in Tuva and the Baikal. The conquest of the Sayan Tribes will increase our influence in the region.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: annex_altai_uriankhai_rus_desc;Our increased influence in Tuva allows us to further integrate the region
column2: this act however will force the Oirats to act.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: vassalize_buryatia_rus_desc;The Oirat control in Central Siberia has collapsed
column2: we need to fill this vacuum of power.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: the_daurs_rus_title;Take control in the Daur Khanate;;;;;;;;;;;;x
the_daurs_rus_desc;The Oirat control in the North has collapsed
column2: we need to fill this vacuum of power.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: the_manchu_russia_desc;The momentum of the Pacific Push still hasn't slowed down. A lot of Cossacks still search for their own
column2: new
column3: suitable plot of land. Many of these tribes now violated the territory of the Jurchen
column4: a tributary of the Great Shun. This needs to be settled so that further conflict can be avoided.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: Aldan and Vilyuy Rivers and are fabled as horse breeders. But now they pose the last obstacle in our Push to the Pacific
column3: their subjugating would not only give us access to their skills
column4: but also their rich fur market.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: the_manchu_ruthenia_desc;The momentum of the Pacific Push still hasn't slowed down. A lot of Cossacks still search for their own
column2: new
column3: suitable plot of land. Many of these tribes now violated the territory of the Jurchen
column4: a tributary of the Great Shun. This needs to be settled so that further conflict can be avoided.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: the_pacific_rus_desc;Our troops have finally reached the long awaited coastline
column2: but our forces meet resistance from the local population. Even though our troops were successfull
column3: the areas of Kamchatka and Chukchia are now almost uninhabitated. Nevertheless
column4: we should formally announce the annexetion of these territory!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: recreate_bulghar_khanate_desc;The Bulghars once lived in what is now Kazan. While their origins aren't known many think that the Chuvash are their direct decendents or are atleast linguistically related. As we have now established a dominant position in both Inner and Outer Kazan we are able to reclaim their lost legacy!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

build_white_sea_canal_desc;The Anglo-Nordic control over the Baltic Sea still poses a risk for trade and conflict. If we connect the Wyg with Lake Onega we would be able to circumvent their tariffs while at the same time make use of the Northeast Passage. This would strengthen the regions of Karelia and Kola.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

con_cossacks_desc;While the Kazani Raids are over the tribes of Astrakhan and Crimea still threaten our influence in the Steppe. With the support of the Cossacks we would be able to counter their raids.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
proclaim_tsardom_desc;Now that we control a realm stretching from the Urals to the Steppes
column2: we can proclaim the the Tsardom of Russia. While this title will probably not be recognized by the other Great Powers
column3: this will certainly support our Pan-Russian Ambitions.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_russia_desc;The russian states have been disunited ever since the collapse of the Kievian Rus'. However
column2: now that we managed to build a power base and established ourselves as the leading force in russian unification it is time to reclaim our lost glory and
column3: after centuries

column1: form_ruthenia_desc;The russian states have been disunited ever since the collapse of the Kievian Rus'. However
column2: now that we managed to build a power base and established ourselves as the leading force in russian unification it is time to reclaim our lost glory and
column3: after centuries

column1: reunite_imeretia_desc;The Kingdom of Imereti was an independant state ever since the dissolution of Georgia. However
column2: the recent subjugation and vassalization by the Timurids left the Kingdom in ruins. Local nobles used this opportunity to declare independence from Kutaisi. We need to restore Imereti
column3: and ultimately reclaim Georgia!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: restore_georgia_desc;The State of Georgia was once a pan-caucasian power
column2: but countless invasions of the Timurids and the plague left the nation in despair and anarchy. Ultimately
column3: this resulted in the fraction into the four Kingdoms of Imereti
column5: Samtskhe and Kartli. Of whom only the first one was able to withstand annexetion from the Timurids until the early 18th century. If we were able to unite these four states under our rule
column6: we could reassert ourselves as the Lords of the Caucasus!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_alvuania_desc;Alvuania (or Albania) was a medieval Kingdom in what is now Aran. Together with Georgia and Armenia they were the first nations to convert to christianity
column2: but today most of the inhabitants assimilated into persian culture and converting to Islam. However
column3: smaller christian alvuani communties still exist all along the Kura River. We should integrate them into our realm!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_armenia_desc;The Armenians can be found all over the Caucasus. However
column2: their main settlement area is near Lake Van and in the Rum province. We should instrumentalize their scattered settlements and expand our claims!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: reclaim_sochi_desc;The city of Sochi once was part of the Kingdom of Abkhazia
column2: which got integrated into Georgia in the 11th century. The city itself was part of the georgian state until the 15th century
column3: when Georgia was dismantled. Now that we rebuild the state we should lay claims on the city!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: control_darial_desc;The Dar-i Alan (or Darial) Gorge is the only bigger pass through the Greater Caucasus. Furthermore the area is inhabitated by the Ossetians
column2: who
column3: for the most part or Orthodox Christians. It is in our interest to claim both sides of this path!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: restore_alania_desc;The Kingdom of Alania was a major power in the North Caucasus during the middle ages. During the Mongol Invasion the Kingdom was destroyed
column2: many Alanians fled into the safety of the Greater Caucasian Mountains
column3: while others joined the Mongols. As we are now a free state again we should reclaim our once lost lands!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: or Mets Hayk' originally referred to Armenian Kingdom in the Armenian Highlands. However
column3: since the Middle Ages the term was used to distinguish it from Cilicia
column4: the last independent western armenian state. Now is the time to instrumentalize the term to lay claim on the a unified Armenia

column1: join_armenia_desc;Now that a new armenian state has been established
column2: we should unify with our brethern.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: become_armenia_desc;With the Azeri Khanates defeated and Eastern Armenia reclaimed
column2: we should proclaim a new armenian state!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_eastern_armenia_desc;Ever since the end of Bagratids armenian statehood was fragile
column2: with only two minor armenian domains: Cilicia and Khachen. Of whom only we survived until now
column3: even though not entirely independent. However
column4: the recent and unexpected collapse of the Timurids change this. While we are now a sovereign state
column5: new threats arrose: The Azeri Khanates. We should utilize this new situation and to quickly reclaim Eastern Armenia!;;;;;;;;;;;;x
